Name: Midnight Stories 2
About the game: Disclaimer - The characters in this game are all over 18 years old. They are adults (grown-up). The content of this game is purely fictitious and has no intention of showing or describing any real event, character or entity. If identical, it is purely coincidental. Midnight Stories The game starts with Cindy, when she's 19 years old. The concept of the game is that Cindy drives the story, but a lot of other characters / pairs For example: Episode 01 is a party where Cindy and Michelle get together, and side stories: Cindy and Lloyd and 1st pair Nadine and Justin. Features: - 4k ultra HD images - completely voiced episodes - (after AUG 2021) 2x images with option to choose your camera: far / close up / rear / above camera for each step - more SFX (ambience, actor gigs, folly) and music - images with a lot of figures and props - as of 07-AUG, a total of 2,291 images and some animations As of 07-AUG, incl. DLC2 has next to the main story, this erotic scenes, with full voice over: - EP01 - Cindy and Michelle, Cindy and Lloyd, Nadine and Justin - EP02 Cindy and Michelle - EP03 Cindy and Michelle In Extra - Cindy is 22 years and the erotic scenes have some animations, but only sometimes voice over: - Extra Scene - Cindy, Ash and Muscle Guy - Extra Scene - Cindy and Ash - Extra Scene - Ash and Justin - Extra Scene - Cindy and Amalia - Extra Scene - Justin and Lucy - Extra Scene - Ash and Devon - Extra Scenes (short) - Cindy and Ash, Devon and Caroline, Justin and Sara and Dee, Amalia and Lucy - Extra Scene - Cindy and Justin - Extra Scene - Jim and Cindy - Extra Scene - Cindy and Zac - Extra Scene - Ash and Eredin - Extra Scene - erotic games in situations with a lot of choices and (hopefully) fun Summary: The game contains: 50,255 words and 2,291 images.
